description: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above. The following deliverables are required: \\[ 1. Complete inventory of each SharePoint instance. 2. ITSEC documentation for the certification of SharePoint Online to be up to Protected B. (Standard Operating Procedures (SOP), evidence of configurations) 3. Information Management policies to SharePoint instances implemented. 4. Bi-weekly progress report on migration activities. Identification of issues, risks, and mitigation strategies. 5. Technical documentation (Requirements, Data Dictionary, Design) 6. Knowledge transfer sessions 7. Migrated SharePoint instances to SharePoint Online \\[ by Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) to identified address. The proposed period of contract shall be from date of contract award to 48 weeks later. Estimated level of effort of the contract will be for 1710 hours (228 days).
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Temporary Help Services for Correctional Services

**Title:** Temporary Help Services for Correctional Services
**Reference Number:** cb-863-24502133
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 21120-24-4667738

**Publication Date:** March 28, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** April 5, 2024, 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** April 5, 2024

### About the Requirement

Correctional Service Canada (CSC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for Temporary Help Services. This requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement (SA) holders under EN578-172870, who have qualified under Stream 5 - Computer Services and Category 5.1 - Computer and Application Support - Senior.

### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes:

1. Completing an inventory of each SharePoint instance
2. Documenting ITSEC standards for the certification of SharePoint Online to Protected B level
3. Implementing information management policies to SharePoint instances
4. Submitting bi-weekly progress reports on migration activities
5. Providing technical documentation
6. Conducting knowledge transfer sessions
7. Migrating SharePoint instances to SharePoint Online

### Level of Security Requirement

A minimum security level of Secret is required for this project.

### Associated Documents

* Request for Proposal (RFP) 21120-24-4667738
* Tender Description and Requirements

### Estimated Contract Period and Level of Effort

The proposed contract period is from the date of contract award to 48 weeks later. The estimated level of effort is 1710 hours (228 days).

### Contracting Authority

* Denise St-Clair
* Phone: (343) 598-8243
* Email: [denise.st-clair@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:denise.st-clair@csc-scc.gc.ca)

Note: Interested suppliers must be qualified SA holders and have a Supply Arrangement (SA) under EN578-172870. For more information, please contact: tpsgc.pasat-apths.pwgsc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Attachments:

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35101/4667738---notice-of-proposed-procurement.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform
